actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Nutrition, Oversight, and Department Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce.

Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Labor, Financial Services, and Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
